----
= Erase Data Plugin =
----

<wiki:toc />

== Description ==

This plugin adds a context menu item to the right click menu which allows you to delete data.

== Usage ==

To access this menu, select a torrent, and right click as shown here:

http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/4228/rightclick2.png

Then, on the right click menu, select "Remove and" as shown here:

http://img718.imageshack.us/img718/4228/rightclick2.png

Select "Delete Data", and by default, a new context window will come up:

http://img696.imageshack.us/img696/6184/removedata.png

Click "Ok" and your torrent data will be removed. If you wish to disable this context window, and not be asked to confirm each time, you can change the menu option in settings.

Click the settings icon: http://img215.imageshack.us/img215/5652/icon06settings.png

and uncheck "Confirm when deleting torrents"  _(this is shown checked in the screenshot below, as it is the default setting)_
http://img504.imageshack.us/img504/314/confirmo.png
